sentences: Teine lumi hoiab oma suve vaikselt.
Ta naeratusest ja teisel k체ljel j채채b silmapaistvaks.
context: In Estonian, 'teisel' is a form of the numeral adjective used to refer to something additional or different from one already mentioned. It is commonly used in comparisons and when introducing an extra example or element in a narrative.
